name: 許華倚　Office Hours
objective:
Including ten problems
1. Simple pure conduction problem
2. cylindrical conduction for steady non uniform k
3. fully develop duct
4. fin conduction convection for fully develop
5. ideal flow
6. sudden expansion compressible
7. Free convective flow for fully develop
8. Axial symmetry flow
9. Infinitely combustion reaction
10. Turbulent flow
schedule:
Including ten problems
week 1 introduction
week 2 numerical method
week 3 finite volume method introduction
week 4. Simple pure conduction problem
week 5. cylindrical conduction for steady non uniform k
week 6. fully develop duct
week 7. fin conduction convection for fully develop
week 8. ideal flow
week 10. sudden expansion compressible
week 11. Free convective flow for fully develop
week 12. Axial symmetry flow
week 13. Infinitely combustion reaction
week 14. Turbulent flow
week 15. Computational fluid dynamics
week 16.  Final report presentation
week 17. Final report presentation
materials: Please bring your own labtop to class.
